description: Lists the details of the organization and account instances of IAM Identity Center that were created in or visible to the account calling this API.

nested_items.name: Instances
nested_items.description: Lists the IAM Identity Center instances that the caller has access to.

nested_items.name: InstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Identity Center instance under which the operation will be executed. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: IdentityStoreId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the identity store that is connected to the Identity Center instance.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID number of the owner of the Identity Center instance.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Identity Center instance.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Identity Center instance was created.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of this Identity Center instance.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token for the list API. Initially the value is null. Use the output of previous API calls to make subsequent calls.
